subject: Basketball
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Judge Richard Fruin, in Los Angeles Superior Court, found that V. Stiviano presented no evidence to support her claim that Sterling had called her a thief and an embezzler in public forums.
snippet: Judge Richard Fruin, in Los Angeles Superior Court, found that V. Stiviano presented no evidence to support her claim that Sterling had called her a thief and an embezzler in public forums.
